title: O Phwrbu dwiden jwngkhou
lyrics:
O Phwrbu dwiden jwngkhou
O Phwrbu fwrwng jwngkhou -2


“Nwngni haywi jebw gwiya Phwrbu-2”
“Nangou jwngnw nwngni gwthar jiu
Nangou jwngnw nwngni gwhw khou -2”
(A)
“San  arw hatorki nwngni swrjinai
Srang arw khwmsibw nwngni swrjinai -2”
“Nwngni haywi jebw -------------2”
 (B)
“Jwbnw gwiywi jiu nwngniao lonw
Jwbnw gwiywi onnai nwngniao lonw-2”
“Nwngni haywi jebw -------------2”
